parameters.body/messageBody:
Adaptive Card: @{outputs('CreateApproval(forTCT)_Mondays')?['body/adaptiveCard']}


Respond Link: @{outputs('CreateApproval(forTCT)_Mondays')?['body/respondLink']}


Item Link: @{outputs('CreateApproval(forTCT)_Mondays')?['body/itemLink']}

ApprovalCreationInput/responseOptions: APPROVED - Automatically update the "Telehealth Master Schedule" with this change...
DENIED - Do not modify the "Telehealth Master Schedule"...
[DO NOT USE YET] CHANGED - Request able to be fulfill with a change to date/time/room/building…

DENIED - Do not modify the "Telehealth Master Schedule"...

parameters.emailMessage/Body:
[testing - CLINICAL PROVIDER INSTRUCTION APPROVAL TEMPLATE]

A request to reserve @{outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_1']} CBOC's Telehealth CVT Room #@{outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_2']} was submitted on your behalf. Please review the reservation details below:

  • @{If( empty(outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_17']), Concat( 'On ', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/Modified_DayOfWeek'], ' from ', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_27'], ' your clinic (named ', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/Modified_ClinicLocationName'], ') has the entire ', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_1'], ' CBOC Room #', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_2'], ' successfully reserved to allow you to provide remote Telehealth care to an upcoming Veteran.' ), Concat( 'On ', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/Modified_DayOfWeek'], ', ', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_16'], 'from ', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_27'], ' your clinic (named ', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/Modified_ClinicLocationName'], ') has the entire ', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_1'], ' CBOC Room #', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_2'], ' successfully reserved to allow you to provide remote Telehealth care to an upcoming Veteran.' ) )}
  • This reservation request (which was originally submitted by @{outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_11']}) has been APPROVED by @{outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_14']} on @{outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_13']}.
  • You should continue with any necessary actions or coordinations with the scheduling team to ensure that the Veteran you are treating virtually on this day & time has a correctly configured appointment registered in VistA/CPRS (such as entering RTC orders, consults, or DST).
  • On the date & time of your Veteran's scheduled appointment, you should:
  1. Click https://care.va.gov/webapp2/home to open the CVT portal,
  2. @{concat( 'Initiate a video call to ', '', string(outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_4']), '@evn.va.gov', ',' )}
  3. Conduct your telehealth video visit with the Veteran as normal, documenting appropriately in CPRS

If you have any connection or troubleshooting issues, you can call the @{outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_1']} CBOC's telehealth room directly at extension #@{outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_5']} . Alternatively, you can reach the assigned Telehealth Tech (@{outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_29']}) by phone at extension #@{outputs('GetItem(TelehealthMasterSched_CombiTable)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_30']} or cell phone (@{outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_31']}).

Additional instructions or support are availalble on the Hines Telehealth Team's SharePoint site: https://dvagov.sharepoint.com/sites/vhahin/htc/


Thank you,

Hines VA Telehealth Team!

[testing - TELEHEALTH TECH INSTRUCTION APPROVAL TEMPLATE]


A provider's (@{outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/selectedClinicalStaff_email']}) reservation request #@{outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/ID']} (which was originally submitted by @{outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_11']}) has been APPROVED by @{outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_14']} on @{outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_13']}. As the designated primary TCT assigned to the @{outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_1']} CBOC, it is important that you review the approved reservation details to make sure that any other arrangments are appropriately initiated and completed, such as (but not limited to):

  • VistA clinics profiles or grids need to be modified, created, or canceled
  • Veteran appointment is correctly scheduled on both PAT/PRO side
  • No equipment issues that require any workorders or tickets are needed to Engineering, OIT, BioMed, or other department
  • Contact to the clinical staff members (@{outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/selectedClinicalStaff_email']}) to provide specific day-of connection information/links [or TEST:@{concat( 'Contact to the clinical staff members (', '', trim(outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/selectedClinicalStaff_email']), '', ') to provide specific day-of connection information/links' )} ]
  • Contact the scheduled Veteran to provide specific day-of patient instructions

If there is some conflict or other problem that may prevent the Veteran's appointment from being successfully completed on the upcoming date & time, then it is CRITICAL that you take the necessary actions to escalate any barriers to the appropriate group or leadership before any issues negatively impact this Veteran's healthcare. Additional instructions or support are availalble on the Hines Telehealth Team's SharePoint site: https://dvagov.sharepoint.com/sites/vhahin/htc/


Thank you,

Hines VA Telehealth Team!

[testing - CLINICAL PROVIDER INSTRUCTION DENIAL TEMPLATE]

A request to reserve @{outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_1']} CBOC's Telehealth CVT Room #@{outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_2']} was submitted on your behalf. @{If( empty(outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_17']), Concat( 'The request to reserve a Telehealth room on ', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/Modified_DayOfWeek'], ' from ', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_27'], ' for your clinic (named ', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/Modified_ClinicLocationName'], ') in the ', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_1'], ' CBOC Room #', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_2'], ' was reviewed. Unfortunately, an the request was not able to be approved at this time.' ), Concat( 'The request to reserve a Telehealth room on ', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/Modified_DayOfWeek'], ' from ', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_27'], ' for your clinic (named ', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/Modified_ClinicLocationName'], ') in the ', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_1'], ' CBOC Room #', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_2'], ' was reviewed. Unfortunately, an the request was not able to be approved at this time.' ) )} Please review the reservation details below:

  • This reservation request (which was originally submitted by @{outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_11']}) has been DENIED by @{outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_14']} on @{outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_13']}.
  • The following comments were provided about this DENIAL action: @{if( empty(outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_15']), Concat( ' ', 'NONE / No comments were provided...' ), Concat( ' ', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_15'] ) )}

As the clinical provider, you should continue with any necessary actions or coordinations with the scheduling team or the Telehealth team to ensure that the Veteran you intended to treat virtually on this day & time have alternative arrangements or clinical instructions facilitated without the use of the requested Telehealth CVT room as originally requested.

You may use the '578 Telehealth Resource App' to begin a new reservation request at any time. Additional instructions or support are availalble on the Hines Telehealth Team's SharePoint site: https://dvagov.sharepoint.com/sites/vhahin/htc/


Thank you,

Hines VA Telehealth Team!

[testing - TELEHEALTH TECH INSTRUCTION DENIAL TEMPLATE]


A provider's (@{outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/selectedClinicalStaff_email']}) reservation request #@{outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/ID']} (which was originally submitted by @{outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_11']}) has been DENIED by @{outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_14']} on @{outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_13']}. As the designated primary TCT assigned to this CBOC, it is important that you are aware of these DENIED reservation details:

  • @{Concat( 'The request to reserve CVT room #', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_2'], ' on ', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/Modified_DayOfWeek'], ' from ', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_27'], ' in the ', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_1'], ' for a clinic named "', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/Modified_ClinicLocationName'], '" was DENIED!' )}
  • The following comments were provided about this DENIAL action: @{if( empty(outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_15']), Concat( ' ', 'NONE / No comments were provided...' ), Concat( ' ', outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/field_15'] ) )}

@{concat( 'If there is any assistance you can provide to the clinical team to find alternative arrangements to avoid interuptions to Veteran care, please contact to the clinical staff members (', '', trim(outputs('GetItem(App_ReservationLog)_PreEmailNotices')?['body/selectedClinicalStaff_email']), '', ') to provide specific day-of connection information/links' )}. Additional instructions or support are availalble on the Hines Telehealth Team's SharePoint site: https://dvagov.sharepoint.com/sites/vhahin/htc/


Thank you,

Hines VA Telehealth Team!
